All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFragment
    Shows information about the developer team and the website
    API
    The API class handles all the operations related to the REST API for Los Portales Theatre
    CartFragment
    Fragment for the Cart where the customer can see the tickets they want to purchase
    HomeFragment
    Fragment for the home page where the upcoming plays are displayed
    LoginFragment
    Fragment for the login, where the customer can login with its credentials
    MainActivity
    It's the Main Activity, handles the NavigationView, the fragments and sets up the mutable API class.
    RegistrationFragment
    Fragment for the registration, where the customer can register into the system
    SeatFragment
    Fragment for the seat plan, where available seats for selected play are shown
    TicketsFragment
    Fragment for the Tickets, where the customer can see their previous purchases
    ViewTicketsFragment
    Fragment to see the tickets of a particular transaction with its qr code
